Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Requires a landlord to have clean hands to bring action for rent or eviction in certain cases
Summary: Relates to conditions precedent to the bringing of certain actions or proceedings.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to conditions precedent to the bringing of certain actions or proceedings
